name: A Sloth For Both Seasons
summary: A Sloth for Both Seasons is a free 2D click-and-point adventure game. It has no inventory. The game can be controlled via mouse. It was a candidate for the March 2016 MAGS competition. The player is a female sloth in the Amazon rain forest during the dry seasons. It is mating season and the first task is to get the male sloth to mate with you. This humorous game features a day-and-night cycle and a voice-over from the developer.
